article_text: With Kansas finances decimated by tax cuts and the voting status of thousands of citizens in limbo, the perils of electing leaders intent on far-right experimentation are painfully apparent. Fortunately, voters have a chance in this year’s primary and general elections to elect smart candidates who want to return the state to sensible governing.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Kansas, secretary of state, Kris Kobach, voting, Scott Morgan, insurance commissioner, obamacare, Affordable Care Act, Sandy Praeger, Clark Shultz
article_metadata.title: Reject extremism in Kansas’ Aug. 5 primary | The Kansas City Star

article_summary:
With Kansas finances decimated by tax cuts and the voting status of thousands of citizens in limbo, the perils of electing leaders intent on far-right experimentation are painfully apparent.
Fortunately, voters have a chance in this year’s primary and general elections to elect smart candidates who want to return the state to sensible governing.
